message: I have a great product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $70.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $70. I can offer you a compromise at $90
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $75.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $85
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $78.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to give you a slight discount. I can offer it to you for $82
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $79.
I'm almost at my minimum price, but I'm willing to make one last compromise. I can offer it to you for $81
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $80.
